REINSTATED.Definition: restored or brought back into effect

TOIL AWAY.Definition: work hard and continuously, often without rest

CONTEXT.Definition: the circumstances or environment in which it occurred

CLAPPED IN IRONS.Definition: restrained or imprisoned with metal chains

COERCION.Definition: use of force or threats to persuade someone to do something

DECEPTION.Definition: the act of tricking or misleading

DEBT BONDAGE.Definition: a situation in which a person is forced to work to repay a debt

EXPLOITATION.Definition: the act of unfairly or cruelly using someone for personal gain

BROADER.Definition: wider or more extensive in meaning

EXPLOITED.Definition: used unfairly or taken advantage of

CONCENTRATED.Definition: directed or focused in that area

PREVALENCE.Definition: the state of being widespread or common

VOLATILE.Definition: unstable or likely to change suddenly and unexpectedly

AUTHORITARIANISM.Definition: a system of government characterised by strict obedience to authority

VULNERABLE.Definition: easily harmed or susceptible to harm

FAMINE.Definition: a situation in which large numbers of people have little or no food

SERVITUDE.Definition: a state of being enslaved or in forced labour

PROSTITUTION.Definition: the act of engaging in sexual activity for payment

OVERLAPS.Definition: parts that cover the same area of interest

SUSCEPTIBLE.Definition: likely to be affected by it

TRAP.Definition: a situation from which escape is difficult

BONDAGE.Definition: the state of being bound or enslaved

FROM DAWN TO DUSK.Definition: from morning until evening, throughout the day

LAUNDROMAT.Definition: a place where money or assets can be concealed or laundered

MUCH TALK.Definition: a lot of discussion or conversation

WORK PERMIT.Definition: authorisation to work in the country

LIVE LIKE A KING.Definition: enjoy a luxurious or expensive lifestyle

A FRACTION OF.Definition: a small portion or part of

APPROACHED.Definition: came near or got closer to

WRITHE AROUND.Definition: twist or move his body in pain

TO DATE.Definition: until now or up to the present

PROUDLY.Definition: with a feeling of pleasure or satisfaction

INCENTIVES.Definition: motivations or reasons for doing it

SCOURGE.Definition: a cause of suffering or harm

CHILD BRIDE.Definition: a young girl who is forced into marriage
